speech:
I can help you to improve your concentration.
I found these links online which might be helpful to you. 
https://www.artofmanliness.com/2012/08/08/12-concentration-exercises-from-1918/
https://www.theguardian.com/money/2010/jul/24/secret-to-improving-concentration
Now, Let us talk about the activities that you enjoy the most..

Here are the quick results that I think will be useful. Check out them .....
https://www.huffingtonpost.com/2013/08/28/how-to-focus_n_3795523.html
https://www.magneticmemorymethod.com/improve-focus/
I enjoy learning from conversations with people like you. What kind of activities keep you happy?
